root: ^I"m interrupted by the door opening and someone shouting.

c-0: ^Murmur erupts and dies immediately as more people enter the inn, followed lastly by someone I don't know.

c-1: ^He's tall, got dark skin that's still lighter than Illij's, as if it was a mix of the two.

^His clothes are strange, red and brown, with green lines running down in a design that must have taken forever to sew.   ¤He walks in and looks around, everyone else staring up at him as if he's their long lost child who came home after war.

c-2: ^He looks, all in all, like an asshole.
^No, looking at his clothes, he looks like a rich asshole.

c-4: ^§§"I can see you all have questions. I will take my time to answer them, don't you worry. But first, I"ll need a drink. It's been a long journey."

^The people seem to eagerly await his every move, but Deidre (the innkeep) instinctually sets into motion at the order of a drink. The crowd loosens up, and the murmur begins anew, as the guest waltzes through the inn.

c-5: ^The Sage sits down and immediately people start asking questions he answers in the most leasurely way possible.

talk: ^I glance over at Ceara, who doesn’t seem to know what to do either.
^§§...Don't know if I want to listen to him.

c-0: ^"Not sure" she says. "This air is killing me."
c-1: ^"I... You want to talk to him?"

c-0: ^>Ceara nods.< "Yeah, let's get out of here."
